UICOMP is part of a 900-bed hospital district containing two major hospital systems, separate private and public university systems, and dozens of community partners that together provide a strong, collaborative research environment. Areas of Research Alzheimer’s Disease Cancer Research Cardiovascular Disease Research Liver Function Neuroscience Medical Student Research Neurotoxicology Radiology Spinal Cord Injury Stroke Research Resources/Programs Center for Outcomes Research Institutional Review Board James Scholar Program Caterpillar Faculty Scholars Jump Simulation RESEARCH COLLABORATION HUB » Instructions × RESEARCH COLLABORATION HUB (beta) NOTE: The Research Collaboration Hub is intended for sharing research projects and research opportunities. The website is currently in beta mode. Instructions for filling out research projects Please indicate if this project is already completed, actively in progress, or has not yet been started. Also indicate in the email and phone number fields what is the appropriate contact information for the PI or research team. Under the research fields and research type headings, please choose the most appropriate category or categories that fit the project (if no none of the categories match the research type, please notify your department). For keywords, please use NIH MeSH terms . A project title and brief description are necessary to complete the entry. Finally, please indicate if there are roles for medical students, residents, fellows or other faculty on this project.
